<!-- @generated by usage-cli from usage spec -->
# `morphir`

**Usage**: `morphir [FLAGS] <SUBCOMMAND>`

**Version**: 0.1.0

- **Usage**: `morphir [FLAGS] <SUBCOMMAND>`

## Flags

### `-h --help`

Print help (use --help-all to include experimental commands)

### `--help-all`

Print help including experimental commands

### `-V --version`

Print version
